mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ANI ( ANINO, ANIBREED, ANINAME, ANIBIRTH, ANISITE, ANIINFO, SPECIESNO, ANIGENDER, NEUTER, MEMBERNO ) VALUES ( ANI_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, #{aniBreed}, #{aniName}, #{aniBirth}, #{aniSite}, #{aniInfo}, #{speciesNo}, #{aniGender}, #{neuter}, 0 )

SELECT ANI_SEQUENCE.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ANIATTACH (ANIATTACHNO, ANINO, ANISAVENAME, ANIUSERNAME, ANIFILESIZE) VALUES (ANI_ATTACH_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL, #{aniNo}, #{aniSaveName}, #{aniUserName}, #{aniFileSize)
mapper.select: SELECT ANINO, ANINAME, ANIREGDATE, ANIBIRTH, ANI.SPECIESNO, SPECIESNAME, ANIDEL FROM ANI INNER JOIN SPECIES ON ANI.SPECIESNO = SPECIES.SPECIESNO ORDER BY ANINO DESC

SELECT ANINO, ANIBREED, ANINAME, ANIBIRTH, ANISITE, ANIINFO, ANIREGDATE, ANIGENDER, NEUTER, ANIHITS, ANI.SPECIESNO, SPECIESNAME FROM ANI INNER JOIN SPECIES ON ANI.SPECIESNO = SPECIES.SPECIESNO WHERE ANINO=#{aniNo}
